"Believe in Yourself" by The Monkees: This song would remind me to have faith in my abilities and never give up on my dreams.
"Eye of the Tiger" by Survivor: This song would motivate me to push through challenges and achieve my goals.
"I Will Survive" by Gloria Gaynor: This song would remind me that I can overcome any obstacle and come out stronger on the other side.
"Lose Yourself" by Eminem: This song would inspire me to let go of my fears and give it my all in everything I do.
"Unstoppable" by Sia: This song would remind me that I am capable of achieving great things and that I should never give up on my dreams.
